name: Gronk & Lizzie
description:
A local multiplayer game with a golem and a lizard

Lizzie a small and sensible lizard got stuck in a ancient temple underground and woke up an long forgotten golem named Gronk. Now they have to join forces and find a way out of the temple.

RECOMMEND TO PLAY ON FULLSCREEN FOR THE CAMERA TO WORK AS INTENDED. Controls
  • Player 1 (Gronk)

W to Jump that can cause earth quakes 

A and D  to move left and right

Spacebar to Grab boxes

  • Player 2 (Lizzie)

 Arrow Up to Jump

Arrow Left and Right to Move

Right Shift to dash

Right Ctrl to Interact

Team IKEA GAMES

Game Programmer / UI Artist: Andre Borja Miranda - Itch.io / Linkedin

Project Manager / Level Designer: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - Itch.io / Linkedin

Sound Designer / Artist: Marie Kyla Englis - Itch.io
